snippet: The social network said it would make changes to Trending Topics, including no longer referring to a list of national news sources.
abstract: Facebook says internal probe finds no evidence of continual political bias in selecting news for its Trending Topics app; social network had been accused of  eschewing conservative content.

byline.contributor: Cecilia Kang contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The social network said it would make changes to Trending Topics, including no longer referring to a list of national news sources.

headline.main: Facebook Says an Investigation Found No Evidence of Bias in a News App
headline.print_headline: In Internal Investigation, Facebook Finds No Anti-Conservative Bias
